plot outline: Kaali is hiding with her son in a witness protection programme supervised by Aniket. JinLiang escapes during his deportation which turns Kaali's peaceful life upside down and eventually she loots the biggest drug consignment with the help of an uprising drug mafia named Swapan, who was trying to regain his lost pride.
title: Kaali
plot: _Kaali_ (qv) is hiding with her son in a witness protection programme supervised by Aniket. JinLiang escapes during his deportation which turns _Kaali_ (qv)'s peaceful life upside down and eventually she loots the biggest drug consignment with the help of an uprising drug mafia named Swapan, who was trying to regain his lost pride.
